message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for $180. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $165? It's a fair price considering the product's value.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with $160 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise.
